title: ✦SPACIOUS 4Bed Apt NEAR RED LINE T avail.9/1(HALF FEE)
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 46988757', 'Rent: $3,100 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Renovated in 2015.', red line train station, stores, restaurants and shops.', 'Pet friendly upon landlord approval.', 'Please call/email Chris to schedule a showing!', 'chrisg @ <URL>', 'Click the link below to search all
